main_definition: Something that is unusual, uncommon or not familiar.

meanings_and_examples.example: It was strange how the machine worked without any visible wires.
The cat's odd behavior of meowing at night puzzled its owner.
Finding a four-leaf clover is considered strange because it rarely happens.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Different from what one expects or norms in society
meanings_and_examples.example: His style of dressing was strange compared to his peers' fashion sense.
She often engages in strange rituals that others find unusual.
